summary: A small tomb north-west of Whiterun that contains the legendary weapon "Ragnorok: The End Sword"
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]lL9gdsEtW-s[/youtube]

It's a small-ish leveled dungeon, north-west of Whiterun (see picture).

Filled with, bandits, draugr, and a handful of dremora.

But believe me, it's worth it.

You get a sweet two-handed sword at the end that has an awesome, hand-crafted custom enchantment on it!



This is my first mod so if you guys have feedback, lemme know.



I crave it!
author: Rushlite

files.name: Rokirs Tomb
files.changelogHtml:
-Added a key for the second locked door in the tomb
-Fixed the bug that causes the sword to dislodge itself from the rock.
-Fixed the enchantment description of the sword at the end.

files.name: Rokirs Tomb
files.changelogHtml:
-Increased strength of bandits and draugr for a more balanced experience.
-Adjusted the brightness of the dungeon to be a bit brighter.
-Increased the strength of the archers outside the tomb
-This should allow followers to come inside with you
-Fixed pathing outside the entrance to the tomb.
